purpose: The email announces a full-time, three-year Post-Doc position at the Johannes Kepler University Linz Institute of Technology. The position involves conducting software engineering research in collaboration with Dynatrace, focusing on topics such as distributed software systems and cloud computing. Candidates are expected to have a strong software engineering background and a Ph.D. in Computer Science or a related field. Applications are invited before the deadline of August 10.
evidence_sentences: We are looking for a (up to three-years contract) Post-Doc for the Johannes Kepler University (JKU) Linz Institute of Technology (LIT).
The Post-Doc is expected to conduct software engineering research in the JKU / Dynatrace Austria Co-Innovation Lab, with a particular focus on one or several of the following topics:

Your qualifications: (o) Strong software engineering background and with experience in one or multiple of the following fields: Distributed Software Systems and Software Architectures, especially Distributed Stream Processing Systems, Real-Time, Scalable Data Processing and Querying, Cloud Computing, Software Performance, especially in Large, Distributed Data Systems and Parallel Computing.
Apply now via the link below (Deadline Aug 10) or contact me in case you have any questions.
